Combat

Weapon Proficiency: Dagger; Dart; Light Crossbow; Quarterstaff; Sling

Durable: Regains a minimum of 6 hit points from a Hit Die roll
Mounted Combatant: Has advantage on melee attacks on an unmounted foe smaller than mount and can redirect attacks on mount to self
Small: Has disadvantage on attacks with heavy weapons
Thrown Arms Master: May throw any weapon (one-handed have range 20/60, two-handed 15/30); light weapon returns after a missed throw

Save Notes:
Brave: Has advantage vs. fright
Mounted Combatant: Mount suffers no damage on a successful Dexterity save and half on failure
Stout Resilience: Has advantage vs. poison and resistance to poison damage
Magic
Spell Slots: S0: 6; S1: 4; S2: 3; S3: 3; S4: 3; S5: 3; S6: 2; S7: 2; S8: 1; S9: 1; W0: 2; W1: 1 Attack: S: 4; W: 7 Spell DC: S: 12; W: 15
Spells:
Arcane Gate (S6 Conj): R10' Creates a portal pair that can teleport creatures 500' for concentration up to 10 min
Chill Touch (S0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic and target cannot regain hit points for 1 rd; undead also suffer disadvantage vs. self attack for 1 rd
Chromatic Orb (W1 Evoc): R90' Ranged spell inflicts 3d8 HP of a choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, poison, or thunder [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Creation (S5 Illu): R30' Creates a 5' cube of false matter lasting up to 1 day [+Level creates a +5' cube]
Death Ward (S4 [Runechild] Abju): Touched retains 1 HP when next reduced to 0 HP or survives the next death effect within 8 hrs
Detect Magic (S1 Divi): R30' Reveals magic auras and their schools for concentration up to 10 min [R]
Dispel Magic (S3 Abju): R120' Ends the effects on the target of a spell up to level 3, and successful DC 10 + spell level checks end each higher-level spell [+Level ends any spell of equal or lesser level]
Enhance Ability (S2 Tran): Touched gains advantage on chosen ability checks for concentration up to 1 hr; Constitution also gives 2d6 temporary HP, Strength doubles carrying capacity, and Dexterity negates damage from a 20' fall [+Level affects +1 target]
Etherealness (S7 Tran): Self enters Ethereal Plane for up to 8 hr [+Level affects +2 or +5 targets at level 8 or 9]
Freedom Of Movement (S4 [Runechild] Abju): Touched gains immunity to movement impediments and can escape from restraints for 1 hr
Friends (S0 Ench): Self gains advantage on Charisma checks with a non-hostile target for concentration up to 1 min; the target becomes hostile afterward
Gate (S9 Conj): R60' Opens a circular portal to another plane for concentration up to 1 min; can be used to bring a creature from another plane
Glyph Of Warding (S3 [Runechild] Abju): 20' radius inflicts 5d8 HP of a choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder (save Dexterity half), or a spell of up to level 3, when triggered [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP or increases the level of the triggered spell by 1]
Greater Restoration (S5 [Runechild] Abju): Touched recovers from exhausted, charmed, petrified, cursed, or ability damage or regains hit point maximum
Ice Storm (S4 Evoc): R300' 20' radius inflicts 2d8 HP bludgeoning and 4d6 HP cold (save Dexterity half) and becomes difficult terrain for 1 rd [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP bludgeoning]
Incendiary Cloud (S8 Conj): R150' 20' radius inflicts 10d8 HP fire (save Dexterity half), obscures, and moves away 10' per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Insect Plague (S5 Conj): R300' 20' radius inflicts 4d10 HP piercing (save Constitution half) for concentration up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Lesser Restoration (S2 [Runechild] Abju): Touched recovers from a choice of blindness, deafness, disease, paralysis, or poison
Longstrider (S1 [Runechild] Tran): Touched gains +10' Speed for 1 hr [+Level affects +1 target]
Mage Armor (S1 Abju): Willing, unarmored touched gains AC 13 + Dexterity modifier for 8 hr; the spell ends if the target dons armor
Mage Hand (S0 Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks, moving up to 10 lb, for 1 min
Magic Circle (S3 [Runechild] Abju): R10' 10' radius prevents a choice of physical entry or exit (save Charisma allows magical transit), inflicts disadvantage on attacks, and negates charm, fright, and possession by one or more choices of celestials, fey, fiends, or undead, for 1 hr [+Level extends the duration +1 hr]
Magic Missile (S1 Evoc): R120' 3 darts inflict 1d4+1 HP force each [+Level creates +1 dart]
Major Image (S3 Illu): R120' Creates a 20' cube sight, sound, and touch illusion (Investigation detects) for concentration up to 10 min [+Level extends the duration to permanent at level 6]
Message (W0 Tran): R120' Self and target can hold a whispered conversation for 1 rd
Move Earth (S6 Tran): R120' Reshapes a 40' cube of earth each 10 minutes for concentration up to 2 hr
Plane Shift (S7 Conj): Target (save Charisma negates) or self and 8 willing others travel to another plane
Prestidigitation (S0 Tran): R10' Creates minor magic effects for 1 hr
Protection From Evil And Good (S1 [Runechild] Abju): Willing touched gains immunity to charm, fright, and possession from aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead and advantage on saves vs. existing conditions for concentration up to 10 min; those creatures also suffer disadvantage on attacks on the target
Protection From Poison (S2 [Runechild] Abju): Touched recovers from 1 poison and gains advantage on saves vs. poison and resistance to poison damage for 1 hr
See Invisibility (S2 Divi): Reveals invisible and ethereal creatures and objects for 1 hr
Seeming (S5 Illu): R30' Changes the appearance of targets (save Charisma negates; Investigation detects) for 8 hr
Shocking Grasp (S0 Evoc): Touched suffers 4d8 HP lightning and loss of reactions until its next turn
Shocking Grasp (W0 Evoc): Touched suffers 4d8 HP lightning and loss of reactions until its next turn
Sleep (S1 Ench): R90' 20' radius puts to sleep 5d8 hit points of creatures, starting with those with the least hit points, for 1 min (damage or shaking wakens) [+Level affects +2d8 hit points of creatures]
Sleet Storm (S3 Conj): R150' 40' radius douses flames and inflicts difficult terrain and falling prone (save Dexterity negates) for concentration up to 1 min
Stoneskin (S4 Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for concentration up to 1 hr
Suggestion (S2 Ench): R30' Target follows a reasonable suggestion (save Wisdom negates) for concentration up to 8 hr
Telekinesis (S5 [Runechild] Tran): R60' Self can mentally move a 1000 lb object 30' per rd (save Strength negates) for concentration up to 10 min
True Strike (S0 Divi): R30' Self gains advantage on the next attack on the target within 1 rd
Wall Of Fire (S4 Evoc): R120' Creates a 60'x20'x1' wall or a 20'x20'x1' ring that inflicts 5d8 HP fire (save Dexterity half) within 10' of a chosen side for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Wizard): Knows 2 wizard cantrips and can cast a chosen W1 spell once per long rest
Arcane Exemplar: May discharge 1 rune to gain 60' fly speed, inflict Disadv vs. self spells, gain resistance to spell damage, and regain spell level HP from casting for 1 rd 1/long rest; stunned afterward for 1 rd
Careful Spell: Can spend 1 Sorcery Point to give 1 creatures a successful save on a self spell
Distant Spell: Can spend 1 Sorcery Point to double the range of a spell or to give a touch spell a 30' range
Essence Runes: Spending Sorcery Points charges an equal number of runes (maximum 20); 5 charged runes emit a bright light in a 5' radius
Font Of Magic: Can use 20 Sorcery Points per long rest and can use a bonus action to convert between Sorcery Points and spell slots
Glyph Of Aegis: May use Reaction to discharge runes, negating 1d8 damage each; touch may transfer the protection of up to 3 runes for 1 hr
Manifest Inscriptions: R60' May discharge 1 rune to reveal hidden glyphs and gain Adv on Arcana to understand
Quickened Spell: Can spend 2 Sorcery Points to cast a 1-action spell as bonus action
Runic Torrent: May discharge 2 runes to change spell damage to force and to push 15' or knock prone (Strength neg) 1/short rest
Sigilic Augmentation: May use Reaction to discharge 1 rune, gaining Adv on a Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution check or save 1/long rest
Sorcerous Restoration: Taking a short rest restores 4 Sorcery Points
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the sorcerer spell list
Subtle Spell: Can spend 1 Sorcery Point to cast a spell without somatic or verbal components
